name: Gorilla Power
description:
You control angry gorilla that wants to set its beloved one free. She is stuck in a hamster wheel and in fact you control her too. You need to keep generating energy until you find a generator.

Objectives
* Set your beloved one free (even if you have to kill all guards;)

Rules
* you need your beloved one to generate power until you find a generator
* if complex runs out of power, alert gets fired
* if you fire alarm, safety doors are closed and guards bring out guns and they are more cautious
* if you need to get rid of a guard, just get close to him.. Gorilla is so pissed off that it bash him by itself

Controls

* Shift - generate electricity (in hamster wheel)
* WASD/arrows - movement (SPACE for jump works too)
